name: The Duff
description: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.
keywords: high school,teen movie,mother daughter relationship,high school student,acronym in title

review.author: eviltwit73
review.heading: More than Watchable.
review.reviewBody: Without the chemistry btw its two leads, this movie would not have worked. Plus, the supporting cast of adults helped. This movie was better than it had any right to be.\n\nWhitman has always been a talented actress. I look forward to her eventually getting some truly meaty movie roles.
